subject: httpunit webForm request.setParameter other than String
msgSnippet: I am very new to httpunit and would appreciate a lift. I need to set a parameter on the WebForm request of type file .  The WebRequest.setParameter only takes
messageBody:
I am very new to httpunit and would appreciate a lift.

I need to set a parameter on the WebForm request of type 'file'. The
WebRequest.setParameter only takes a String as a parameter. The
parameter that I need to set is defined on the JSP Page as a 'file'.
How can I set a parameter of type 'file' with httpunit?



WebForm uploadDocumentsForm = response.getFormWithName("uploadDocs");
WebRequest request = uploadDocumentsForm.getRequest();
request.setParameter("browseText", uploadFile );

NOTE: 'browseText' is of type 'file'. This code fails if uploadFile
is of type String & if uploadFile is of type 'File'.

Many thanks for a lift.
Harold
